model

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends Observable
    Represents an observable shopping cart.
    Author:
    Kimmo Perälä

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCart()
      Creates a new shopping cart HashMap object.

        public int getAmount(int itemId)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
